metadata.Title: CVE-2023-34246 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - high.
metadata.Description: Doorkeeper is an OAuth 2 provider for Ruby on Rails / Grape. Prior to version 5.6.6, Doorkeeper automatically processes authorization requests without user consent for public clients that have been previous approved. Public clients are inherently vulnerable to impersonation, their identity cannot be assured. This issue is fixed in version 5.6.6.

notes.Note: sbeattie> need to verify ruby-doorkeeper-openid-connect as well

criterions.comment: ruby-doorkeeper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ruby-doorkeeper-openid-connect: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
